mapper.select: SELECT MAIN_CALENDAR_NO, MAIN_CALENDAR_TITLE AS TITLE, TO_CHAR(MAIN_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS START1, TO_CHAR("MAIN_END", 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS END FROM MAIN_CALENDAR
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MAIN_CALENDAR( MAIN_CALENDAR_NO, MAIN_CALENDAR_TITLE, "MAIN_START", "MAIN_END", MEMBER_NO ) values ( SEQ_MAIN_CALENDAR_NO.NEXTVAL, #{title}, TO_DATE(#{start1}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{memberNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MAIN_CALENDAR SET MAIN_CALENDAR_TITLE = #{title} , "MAIN_START" = TO_DATE(#{start1}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') , "MAIN_END" = TO_DATE(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') WHERE MAIN_CALENDAR_NO = #{calendarNo}
